title: Experience-based learning design for understanding self-regulated learning (SRL)

context.additional_context: Learners are university students or job seekers, possessing intermediate-level expertise to apply self-regulated learning theory to actual learning situations

learning_goals: Learners can clearly explain the key components of Self-Regulated Learning (SRL)
Learners can reflectively analyze their learning experiences based on SRL theory
Learners can comparatively analyze peers' essays and critically evaluate SRL application cases
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
